# tornado

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tornado is to load the data of tornadoes in United States in 1950-2022 and visualize with shiny.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tornado from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("ETC5523-2024/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-joanna1016ma")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(tornado)
## basic example code
```
